Description: Computational techniques have permeated all stages of oncology drug discovery. With new methods emerging at an ever-increasing pace, the need for rigorous evaluation and benchmarking is pressing. This session aims to provide a didactic perspective on both established and the latest computational approaches in cancer drug discovery. Additionally, it will present their impact through selected case studies.
Location: Room 6 DE - Upper Level - Convention Center
SearchResultBody: ED06. Chemistry to the Clinic Part 3 of 3: From Virtual Screening to Generative Design: Digital Approaches in Cancer Drug Discovery
SearchResultFooter: Room 6 DE - Upper Level - Convention Center
Title: Chemistry to the Clinic Part 3 of 3: From Virtual Screening to Generative Design: Digital Approaches in Cancer Drug Discovery
